A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Many holes\, some great moments\, but the return of Luke that I waited 30 years for was abysmal and wasted.  I felt confused as to why I wasn't thrilled as with The Force Awakens.  I TRIED.  I tried to love this movie but it just didn't happen and I just left annoyed and disappointed.  Great job\, Disney (said with great sarcasm).
